::Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus: How about a false message from some kind of old friend? Lead her to believe a Maximal is trapped here.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Hydras:
 
 "Yes, we have tobe well prepared for defend us....BTW I jsut built a 
 new base... so this one could be a trap itself"

 >

 Kup informs them of recent changes on Cybertron and contemporary 
 Earth.

 wrote:                                  Hydras:
